citations.narrative:
There was one guinea pig pen that did not provide the required amount of floor space. There were approximately 53
weanling guinea pigs housed in a pen that measured approximately 1,936 square inches of floor space. Each weanling
requires a minimum of 60 square inches of floor space. Total floor space required to house these weanlings is 3,180
square inches. There cannot be more than 32 weanling guinea pigs housed in an enclosure measuring 1,936 square
inches.
Inadequate space can cause stress, crowding, and aggression in animals.
The licensee must ensure that all guinea pigs are provided with the minimum amount of floor space in order to avoid
overcrowding and to support the health and well-being of the guinea pigs.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.28(c)(1)(iii)  Repeat
   
Primary enclosures. 
There was one guinea pig pen that did not provide the required amount of floor space. There were approximately 53 
weanling guinea pigs housed in a pen that measured approximately 1,936 square inches of floor space. Each weanling 
requires a minimum of 60 square inches of floor space. Total floor space required to house these weanlings is 3,180 
square inches. There cannot be more than 32 weanling guinea pigs housed in an enclosure measuring 1,936 square 
inches. 
Inadequate space can cause stress, crowding, and aggression in animals. 
The licensee must ensure that all guinea pigs are provided with the minimum amount of floor space in order to avoid 
overcrowding and to support the health and well-being of the guinea pigs. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
